casebody.data:
Steven PLAVIN, Appellant,
v.
GROUP HEALTH INCORPORATED, Respondent. No: 61 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 2, 2019

Chief Judge DiFiore and Judges Rivera, Stein, Fahey, Garcia, Wilson and Feinman concur.

***998Certification of questions by the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit, pursuant to section 500.27 of this Court's Rules of Practice, accepted and the issues presented are to be considered after briefing and argument.
